docs.text: Obsidian tasks ¶ All tasks. ¶ employee ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") can we sort bellow by department sort order? form here? Github Publisher ¶ - [ ] I test it [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") GPT-3 ¶ - [ ] Test it [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") on [Data sources](Data%20sources "Data sources") Import JSON and CSV ¶ - [ ] Test it [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") Mac OS Config ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") check it out NLP Dates ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") can yuo describe how to use time and date what is oru format here. and may be link this info to [task](task "task") Obsidian Plugins ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") add all properties to special folder to test plugin - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") check it our this plugin - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") for some reason i can't install this plugin? can you mak it work? not urgent. - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") sturdy it for [Obsidian Publish](Obsidian%20Publish "Obsidian Publish") - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") pleaes research it when have time. - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") actually a good questison. may be not powerfull. just a query. can you compare it with what we have now? Recruiting VP of CS ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") why photos in table bellow so different from table from [Recruiting VP of Product or Senior Product Manager](Recruiting%20VP%20of%20Product%20or%20Senior%20Product%20Manager "Recruiting VP of Product or Senior Product Manager") ? - [ ] ![Pasted image 20220831102433.png](Pasted%20image%2020220831102433.png "Pasted image 20220831102433.png") ```dataview TABLE photo, status as "status", date_of_next_step, next_step, tech_score, process_score, industry_score, hustle_score, ((default(tech_score,0) + default(process_score,0) + default(industry_score,0) +default(hustle_score,0)) / 4) AS avg_score WHERE contains(role, [[Recruiting VP of CS]]) SORT avg_score desc SORT status ``` Recruiting VP of Product template ¶ - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") please teach me how to use this template when i create a new vp of P page. [discuss](discuss "discuss") - [ ] [Dmitry Korzhov](Dmitry%20Korzhov.md "Dmitry Korzhov") also please teach this [Dmitry Olshevskiy](Dmitry%20Olshevskiy "Dmitry Olshevskiy"), may be record a video how to use templates? Critical tasks. ¶ Dmitry Korzhov please make this research critical Zoho - Cloud Software Suite and SaaS Applications for Businesses we can test it Предоставление доступа к компьютеру Mac с удаленного компьютера - Служба поддержки Apple (RU) Dmitry Korzhov please conenct wiht quip and tell them that this is critical problem for us, we cant find a docuemnts and we can’t reorganize 1k docuemnt perfolder, as we have more then 10k fodlers and it is not good to have do many fodler in high level of hirerchy. Talk with them, tell them that this is critical for us and if they cant fix, we will need to search for new tools(not super agressive but give them a clue), Tasks for today. ¶ Projects ¶ File Next step status Competitors structure - in done Data sources Waiting when Ekaterina Kosenko write 20 data sources in progress Quip analytics Waiting when Ivan help with queries in progress Quip taxonomy Analytics of current knowledge base in Click House in progress Structure of data source - in done Resources and Useful pages & links ¶ From the Modern Data Stack to Knowledge Graphs What is a Knowledge Graph Knowledge Graphs and AI as a Service Liquid. The soul of a new graph database Completing a member knowledge graph with Graph Neural Networks Building The LinkedIn Knowledge Graph KG Course 2021 Keeping Your Notes Tidy - How do You Manage the Growing Number of Tags? docs.text: How to ask for VC/investor introduction double opt-out I am happy to help and forward right intros to right people. Please make my help easier with next steps. Do research of investor vc and please specify with investor is a fit in blurb Send me separate forward-able email to each investor so it will be easier for me just forward this email, instead of write many email to each person when you send me just list of investors Example Hi Daniel, I seen that you know {Investor Name}, i think he may be a fit becase he invested in companies in out industry and stage (examples of companies). Can you forward him our blurb? {blurb with 1 paragraph} {bullet points with metrics} ARR EoE growth NRR {link to deck}
docs.title: How to ask me for investor introduction?
